attributes.action: Close schools 2 weeks before xmas.  Cases are rising to fast
attributes.background: Caes are rising to fast many schools around country are having to close year groups and colleges because of staff being ill. Children are collecting virus and bringing it home to parents and potentially being soresd further so needs closing

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015

MPs will debate the impact of Covid-19 on schools and exams, including the request of this debate, on Monday 7 December.

You'll be able to watch the debate live on Parliament TV at 6pm: https://parliamentlive.tv/Commons
